intro: ^! Come here, I have something for you from Elisa. She worried you didn't have breakfast and sent me with extra ensaymada for you. I knew you'd come in eventually!"

s: ^What? Really? Mrs. Calindas always knows the way to my heart: food.
^Ensaymada? For me? Thank you so much, I was just stopping by to ask you a question, actually.

Chat1: ^Mrcalindas?Smiling "Well, you know since we started teaching you to cook, she's become worried that you aren't eating outside of the lessons."
^Mrcalindas?Smiling "I know you eat, but still- they're good with your coffee."

s: ^Thank you so much for bringing me these. If I wasn't having the block party catered, I'd be begging her to make trays of these. They are my absolute favorite.
^They are my absolute favorite. Thank you so much for bringing me these. I was actually just stopping by to ask you a question.

Chat2: ^Mrcalindas?Smiling "Well, you can tell her the next time to you see her. Speaking of the Block Party, the Health Clinic has a booth there."
^Mrcalindas?Smiling "It's been a long time since this neighborhood had a party, I'm looking forward to it."

s: ^Speaking of the block party, I could really use your help.

QuestIntro: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "Oh? What do you need? I was going to volunteer to run the booth, and bring little swag bags."
^Mrcalindas?Neutral "I'm just a little worried they won't contain what the community needs... Wait a second. Maybe you can help me?

s: ^Oh that's great! I was going to ask you to run the booth. How can I help you?
^I was just going to ask you to run the booth. So I can help you with whatever you need.

QuestDetails1: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "I don't have a lot of time to get materials together, so I need to make sure we are giving the community what it needs."
^Mrcalindas?Neutral "I want to know what the community is really concerned about health-wise."
^Mrcalindas?Neutral "We have so many programs, but sometimes it's hard to know what the community really needs. I want people to trust the Bloomwood Clinic."

s: ^That's really thoughtful, Mr. Calindas. Can you tell me more?
^What a great idea. Trust is really important you know.
^Great! I can help you with whatever you need.

OptionalQuestDetails1: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "It is important. We care about our patients. During Covid, the community rallied behind us and we worked together."
^Mrcalindas?Neutral "It's important to keep that spirit alive by listening to what they want so we keep their trust."

s: ^I never thought of it that way. People should be able to trust their healthcare professionals.
^You're absolutely right. I can help you with whatever you need.

QuestDetails2: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "Yes, they should. Many people don't trust healthcare for valid reasons."
^Mrcalindas?Neutral "However, if we want people to trust us with their health, we need to be respectful of their needs. They trust me, so this booth is my job."

s: ^This is exactly why I hoped you'd run the booth, Mr. Calindas.
^I knew you'd be happy to run the booth. Let's work together. I can help you with whatever you need.

OptionalQuestDetails2: ^Mrcalindas?Neutral "Well, see? I already knew you'd ask. Now, what I need to know is something specific. Can you do some research for me?"

s: ^No problem. I'm ready to help.
^Let's work together. I can help you with whatever you need.

QuestAcceptance: ^Mrcalindas?Smiling "Excellent. Can you talk to Lila and ask her what the parents and children of Bloomwood are concerned about?"
^Mrcalindas?Smiling "And can you ask Rashad what older people and students may need? I want to know what programs I should focus on."

s: ^Great. I can do that!
^Talk to Rashad and Lila about the community? Well, that's right up my alley!

Goodbye: ^. I'll tell you what. Do this for me, and next weekend Lucy and I will teach you how to make her ensaymadas. Deal? Now, stop bugging me. I'll see you soon."

s: ^BEST. DEAL. EVER. I'll get on it now. See you soon!
^I'm really excited for this. I'll see you soon, bye!
